title: Bugsplatting
body: As i write this i am in the midst of a 40 minute wait time, I was on leaverbuster because i left a few games in a row, once due to internet issues and once because i had an emergency, the last game i 'left' that forced the leaver buster 20 minute cooldown before 5 games was a bugsplat, even this i wouldnt have been too bothered by due to the fact that the games prior were my fault, however, after waiting the 20 minutes to get into champ select i bugsplat in the champ select, upon submitting a report and restarting the client I was on another 20 minute wait which wasn't leaver buster, and after this 20 minute window finished and i started queue i have to wait another 20 minutes. Very frustrating and not a very enjoyable experience.

replies.body:
There comes a point where other players have to be considered over what should be rare occurrences for a single player, which is why you still receive LeaverBusters after a point, regardless of if the leave is intentional or not.

It sounds like you have some client issues going on though, and resolving those will certainly be the fastest way to get back into game smoothly. Two bug-splats in a row is unusual, and there's obviously something causing the client grief. My first recommendation would be to run a client repair, and if you still experience drama to ticket player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
